name: Pixels2D
tagline: Pixels2D is my first, experimental 2D game engine from developed scratch / C++ and OpenGL
body:
### An experimental 2D game engine

# Developed in C/C++ and OpenGL using SDL and trying out different libraries for textures, fonts and audio...

### Support or Contact
Check out [documentation](http://georgim.com) or [contact support](http://georgim.com/system/#home/contacts).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
